name: Scum (itch)
description:
Scum is a short narrative horror-ish* game made in 9 days for the Nokia 3310 Jam 5.

    * Not sure if it's quite horror but I don't know what else to call it. Close enough!

The Nokia 3310 jam is a jam for making games that use the restrictions of the Nokia 3310 phone: 84x48 pixel resolution, only 2 colors, only 1 audio channel, etc. You can read more about it on the jam page. And check out the other games from this jam here, there are lots of cool ones.

Play time: 10 minutes

(Because of the jam deadline I did not extensively playtest this. I'll probably do a pass after the jam rating period ends to fix bugs if any come up, so let me know!)

Controls

Movement: A / D or Left / Right keys

Select: E or Space

Content warnings
  • Murder, implied suicide, discussion of death of a child
